channel.title: Stuck writing a melody. Got anything out there for inspiration?
channel.description:
For the Auxy Tournament, this round we have to write a melody but I’m really stuck! Anyone have any memorable or interesting melody-centric songs they can link me? Auxy, EDM, classical, underground, mainstream, whatever has a good melody welcomed.
Would be greatly appreciated!

item.title: Stuck writing a melody. Got anything out there for inspiration?
item.dc:creator: anon73773654
item.description:
You’re supposed to play the other loops

Songs have more than one loop ya know

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck writing a melody. Got anything out there for inspiration?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Thanks.

I singled those ones out as the ‘chill’ ones.
Some of my other tracks have more driven lead melodies.

If you haven’t already, feel free to check out…

Nightcrawler
Sketch 24
Sketch 28
The Fall
Sketch 20
Track 13
Track 14

I’ll leave it at that.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck writing a melody. Got anything out there for inspiration?
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
@akabillposters I don’t think I’ve gone through your soundcloud before! There’s some nice stuff. I feel like stress of the time limit (1 minute) is forcing me to condense the melody I’m writing into something very fast, whereas I enjoy kinda what you make – something that takes it time.

item.source: Stuck writing a melody. Got anything out there for inspiration?

item.title: Stuck writing a melody. Got anything out there for inspiration?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Thanks.

SpaghettiSauce:

Do you play piano?

Barely.
Every note of those tracks went from my head straight into Auxy.

Actually, Sketch 22 was finished in Ableton Live, based on stems and MIDI exported from Auxy.
I switched it over to Ableton for access to more sounds.

‘Same as it ever was’ is pure Auxy.

Read full topic
item.source: Stuck writing a melody. Got anything out there for inspiration?

item.title: Stuck writing a melody. Got anything out there for inspiration?
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
I love Sketch 22. The chords and percussion just make it such a nice track to listen to. Same As It Ever Was is also so soothing nice to listen to. Do you play piano?

https://soundcloud.com/akasnd/sketch27
https://soundcloud.com/akasnd/sketch30-over-easy#t=2:31
https://soundcloud.com/akasnd/sketch-22#t=2:09

item.title: Stuck writing a melody. Got anything out there for inspiration?
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
I’m working on a melodious very song right now. I kinda want the whole song to be a super chill jazzy song full of random solos.
Here it is.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/X8tQ6i48ngQVfy3Eyhhlqg==
Keep in mind it’s still a WIP. This would have worked really well with the pitch bend challenge.

item.source: Stuck writing a melody. Got anything out there for inspiration?

item.title: Stuck writing a melody. Got anything out there for inspiration?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Thanks.
There are several melodies in there, but if you’re referring to the piano melody, be aware that’s from ‘La Vie en Rose’ (famous, much covered French song).

It’s the only time I’ve used/referenced a melody from someone else’s music. (I think it works pretty well.)

All the other melodies in that track - and all my other tracks so far - are my own.

Read full topic
